definition: quilt/by/(indicates passive-voice clauses)/(literary) to cover/to meet with/(coll.) (since c. 2009) used before a verb that does not accurately represent what actually happened, to describe with black humor how sb or sth was dealt with by the authorities (as in 被自殺|被自杀[bei4 zi4 sha1])

sentences.english: One of the biggest disrupters of sleep is the pulling and tugging of sheets and blankets.
sentences.chinese: 倆人一塊兒睡的時候，最煩的就是拉被單和揪毯子了。

sentences.english: We are pleased to send you herewith attached Sample-Cuttings of Cotton Shirting and Sheeting.
sentences.chinese: 我方隨函附上棉布襯衫衣料與被單料的樣品片。

sentences.english: Shy Shelly says she shall sew sheets.
sentences.chinese: 害羞的雪莉說她將會織被單。

sentences.english: These settings may be overridden for individual articles.
sentences.chinese: 這些設置可能會被單篇文章所覆蓋。

sentences.english: Mother stretched the sheet out to dry.
He twisted the sheets into a strong rope and escaped.
sentences.chinese: 他把被單搓成一根結實的繩子，然後攀着繩子逃跑了。

sentences.english: Cover your tummy with the coverlet.
Should she sell sheer sheets or should she sell shaggy shawls?
sentences.chinese: 她該賣透明的被單還是毛髮蓬鬆的披肩？

sentences.english: In the mornings I would sneak the soiled sheets to the washbasin and soak them.
sentences.chinese: 早晨起來，我偷偷地把尿溼的被單放到臉盆裏浸上。

sentences.english: Reuse your sheets and towels instead of having them changed every day.
sentences.chinese: 不要每天更換毛巾和被單，可以重複使用它們。

sentences.english: There would also be environmental costs if all multi-dose vials were replaced with single-dose vials.
sentences.chinese: 如果多劑量瓶被單劑量瓶取代，還將帶來環境代價。

sentences.english: He hastily seized the coverlet of his bed, and wrapped it round him.
sentences.chinese: 他急忙從他的牀上抓過被單，把他自己裹了起來。

sentences.english: The baby princess lay in a cradle with a coverlet woven of rose-pink silk.
sentences.chinese: 小公主躺在包着粉紅色絲織被單的搖籃裏。

sentences.english: He fumbled at the embroidered coverlet.
sentences.chinese: 他笨手笨腳地把繡花被單扯來扯去。

sentences.english: Make sure the wet sheets aren't bunched up otherwise they won't dry properly.
sentences.chinese: 確保溼被單別打褶，否則他們幹得不整齊。

sentences.english: Her finger traced the checkered pattern of their flannel sheets.
sentences.chinese: 她的手指描繪出法蘭絨被單上的方格圖案。

definition: to fiddle with/to tamper with/to meddle with/to move randomly/to flail about
